entry.string: oc process -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sogis/pipelines/master/api_webgisclient/data-service/deployment/deploymentconfig.yaml -p NAMESPACE=gdi-integration -p TAG=v2.0.7 -p REPLICAS=1 -p CPU_REQUEST=5m -p CPU_LIMIT=1000m -p MEMORY_REQUEST=200Mi -p MEMORY_LIMIT=400Mi | oc apply -n gdi-integration -f- oc rollout latest -n gdi-integration data-service oc rollout status -n gdi-integration dc data-service
